Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Eddie Reed
Reviews.Content: I would suggest anyone to order from goShot Camera. I ordered a wide angle and a 2x telephoto lens Kit. They arrived as they said they would and the Lens were as described. They do what they say they will.  Eddie Reed

ProductInfo.Features:
52mm 0.45x Wide Angle Lens
52mm 2x Telephoto Lens
+1 +2 +4 +10 Macro Lens Kit
Hard plastic lens cap
Microfiber lens cleaning cloth
ProductInfo.Name: 52mm 0.45x Wide angle + 2X Telephoto lens kit + MACRO +1+2+4+10 Filter set + CAP + CLOTH for Nikon D40 D60 D90 D80 D700 D3000 D3100 D5000 D5100 SLR camera, fit 18-55MM lens 52mm, NEW
